text: "Break Stuff" is a 2000 song by Limp Bizkit and is the fourth and final single from their second studio album Significant Other. It went to number 19 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart, number 28 in the Netherlands, number 41 in Australia and number 9 in Portugal. ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:Limp Bizkit songs Category:Three Days Grace songs
title: Break Stuff
